text: Each inference tip is overriding the previous set inference tip for the corresponding node. This shouldn't be the case. Maybe we can stack them up. Also, we should probably support predicates for inference tips, as we do for transforms.
title: Can't stack multiple inference tips

text: Also this causes https://github.com/PyCQA/astroid/issues/454 (note that the test will be marked as an expected failure, so remove that once this gets fixed)
